content:
To join our Corporate Preferred Program or for additional information please complete the contact form below. 

Chain code: XT

Join our Corporate Preferred Program for exclusive perks

  • Preferred nightly rates
  • Complimentary business services including printing & faxing
  • Waived Urban Bundle Fee
  • Fast Free Wifi on all devices
  • Onsite 24-hour fitness center

To start savings with our Corporate Preferred Program, contact Mark Vega at mvega@highgate.com.
